CustomField.description: Created By Nandish to be used in Contract Integration
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT( Family ), '10','Colocation', '12','Network & Connectivity', '13','Cyber Security', '14','Yotta Cloud', '16','Federated Cloud', '17','IT Management', '18', 'Traded Goods', 'Ad-hoc','Ad-hoc', '')
CustomField.label: Product Family Text
